Hotel Information Check-in: 3:00 pm Check-out: 12:00 pm Smoking: Non-Smoking Parking: Self parking: Not Available Valet:
$40.00
(Click for details) Pets: Service animals allowed: Yes Pets allowed: No Hotel Policies Where we are Find where we are located View the Maps&Directions Page New York,NY NYCMTHX Local Weather This content will open in a overlay Five Day Forecast While You're in Town Restaurant and attraction reviews near this hotel – from travelers like you View Now NYCMTHX Hampton Inn Manhattan-Times Square North 851 Eighth Avenue, New York, New York, 10019, USA TEL: 1-212-581-4100 Book a Room Built in 2005, the impressive Hampton Inn Manhattan-Times Square North has the best Times Square location just steps from Broadway theaters, Restaurant Row, Central Park, Carnegie Hall, many museums, Radio City Music Hall, Rockefeller Center, Jacob Javits Convention Center and all major bus and subway lines. /resources/media/hp/NYCMTHX/en_US/img/shared/full_page_image_gallery/main/HX_exterior3_425x303_FitToBoxSmallDimension_Center.jpg Hampton Inn Manhattan-Times Square North Hotel, NY - Exterior 0 Exterior Conveniently located on Eighth Avenue at 51st Street, the hotel is fast becoming the preferred choice of business and vacation travelers seeking the high-end accommodations and professional services that you would expect from a quality New York City hotel. /resources/media/hp/NYCMTHX/en_US/img/shared/full_page_image_gallery/main/HX_exterior2_2_425x303_FitToBoxSmallDimension_Center.jpg Hampton Inn Manhattan-Times Square North Hotel, NY - Exterior 1 Exterior Hampton Inn Manhattan Times Square North features an array of complimentary amenities and services to ensure your stay in the Big Apple is fun, affordable and hassle-free. /resources/media/hp/NYCMTHX/en_US/img/shared/full_page_image_gallery/main/HX_entrance2_3_425x303_FitToBoxSmallDimension_Center.jpg Hampton Inn Manhattan-Times Square North Hotel, NY - Interior Entrance 2 Rooms&Suites Check-in time at the Hampton Inn Manhattan-Times Square North is 3pm and check-out is 12 noon. /resources/media/hp/NYCMTHX/en_US/img/shared/full_page_image_gallery/main/HX_frontdesk2_4_425x303_FitToBoxSmallDimension_Center.jpg Hampton Inn Manhattan-Times Square North Hotel, NY - Front Desk 3 Rooms&Suites Complimentary wireless Internet access and complimentary USA Today (Monday through Friday) are both available in the hotel lobby. /resources/media/hp/NYCMTHX/en_US/img/shared/full_page_image_gallery/main/HX_lobbydesk2_5_425x303_FitToBoxSmallDimension_Center.jpg Hampton Inn Manhattan-Times Square North Hotel, NY - Reception 4 Rooms&Suites Hampton Inn Manhattan Times Square North has a full-service concierge and theater ticket desk in the lobby. /resources/media/hp/NYCMTHX/en_US/img/shared/full_page_image_gallery/main/HX_concierge2_6_425x303_FitToBoxSmallDimension_Center.jpg Hampton Inn Manhattan-Times Square North Hotel, NY - Concierge Desk 5 Rooms&Suites The hotel has 300 oversized guest rooms (including 150 rooms with two queen beds) with luxurious details and traditional furnishings reminiscent of the style, elegance and sophistication of New York City. /resources/media/hp/NYCMTHX/en_US/img/shared/full_page_image_gallery/main/HX_twoqueens1_7_425x303_FitToBoxSmallDimension_Center.jpg Hampton Inn Manhattan-Times Square North Hotel, NY - Two Queens Bedroom 6 Rooms&Suites Guestrooms feature one King or two queen beds and are the largest guestrooms of any Hampton Inn in New York City. /resources/media/hp/NYCMTHX/en_US/img/shared/full_page_image_gallery/main/HX_twoqueens2_8_425x303_FitToBoxSmallDimension_Center.jpg Hampton Inn Manhattan-Times Square North Hotel, NY - Two Queen Beds 7 Rooms&Suites In-room amenities include 32-inch flat screen television and easy to operate alarm clock/radio. /resources/media/hp/NYCMTHX/en_US/img/shared/full_page_image_gallery/main/HX_twoqnbedsng2_9_425x303_FitToBoxSmallDimension_Center.jpg Hampton Inn Manhattan-Times Square North Hotel, NY - 2 Queen Beds 8 Rooms&Suites All guestrooms feature business amenities including large work desk and chair, plus a lap-desk for your comfort. /resources/media/hp/NYCMTHX/en_US/img/shared/full_page_image_gallery/main/HX_doublequeen2_10_425x303_FitToBoxSmallDimension_Center.jpg Hampton Inn Manhattan-Times Square North Hotel, NY - Double Queen Beds 9 Rooms&Suites Complimentary high-speed wireless Internet access, complimentary local telephone calls and complimentary long-distance access when using a calling card–is provided in all guestrooms. /resources/media/hp/NYCMTHX/en_US/img/shared/full_page_image_gallery/main/HX_kingbedroom_11_425x303_FitToBoxSmallDimension_Center.jpg Hampton Inn Manhattan-Times Square North Hotel, NY - King Bedroom 10 Rooms&Suites Cloud Nine, the Hampton Bed Experience - is found in each guestroom. The upscale bedding package includes plush down-like comforter, crisp white duvet, 500 thread sheets and signature pillows. /resources/media/hp/NYCMTHX/en_US/img/shared/full_page_image_gallery/main/HX_kingstandard_12_425x303_FitToBoxSmallDimension_Center.jpg Hampton Inn Manhattan-Times Square North Hotel, NY - King Standard 11 Rooms&Suites Hampton Inn Manhattan Times Square North has spacious guestroom bathrooms, newly renovated with upscale bath amenities. /resources/media/hp/NYCMTHX/en_US/img/shared/full_page_image_gallery/main/HX_bathroomng2_13_425x303_FitToBoxSmallDimension_Center.jpg Hampton Inn Manhattan-Times Square North Hotel, NY - Bathroom 12 Rooms&Suites Hampton Inn Manhattan Times Square North has accessible rooms with king beds, 2 double beds and 2 queen beds. /resources/media/hp/NYCMTHX/en_US/img/shared/full_page_image_gallery/main/HX_accessbath_14_425x303_FitToBoxSmallDimension_Center.jpg Hampton Inn Manhattan-Times Square North Hotel, NY - Accessible Bathroom 13 Rooms&Suites The hotel's fitness center is complimentary, and available 24-hours per day. /resources/media/hp/NYCMTHX/en_US/img/shared/full_page_image_gallery/main/HX_fitness_32_425x303_FitToBoxSmallDimension_Center.jpg Hampton Inn Manhattan-Times Square North Hotel, NY - Fitness Center 14 Amenities /resources/media/hp/NYCMTHX/en_US/img/shared/full_page_image_gallery/main/HX_giftshop_28_425x303_FitToBoxSmallDimension_Center.jpg Hampton Inn Manhattan-Times Square North Hotel, NY - Gift Shop 15 Amenities Hampton Inn Manhattan Times Square is located steps from Broadway theaters, Restaurant Row, and the best Times Square has to offer. /resources/media/hp/NYCMTHX/en_US/img/shared/full_page_image_gallery/main/HX_sign_17_425x303_FitToBoxSmallDimension_Center.jpg Hampton Inn Manhattan-Times Square North Hotel, NY - Broadway 16 Amenities We are located just five blocks from Central Park. Guests just make a left outside of the entrance, and can be at the world's most famous park in minutes! /resources/media/hp/NYCMTHX/en_US/img/shared/full_page_image_gallery/main/HX_park_37_425x303_FitToBoxSmallDimension_Center.jpg Hampton Inn Manhattan-Times Square North Hotel, NY - Central Park 17 Amenities Walking distance to Rockefeller Center, Radio City Music Hall, and NBC Studios, the hotel is convenient to most Midtown attractions. /resources/media/hp/NYCMTHX/en_US/img/shared/full_page_image_gallery/main/HX_flags_38_425x303_FitToBoxSmallDimension_Center.jpg Hampton Inn Manhattan-Times Square North Hotel, NY - Rockefeller Center 18 Amenities Enjoy the performing arts at Lincoln Center or Carnegie Hall, both venues are walking distance from Hampton Inn Manhattan Times Square. /resources/media/hp/NYCMTHX/en_US/img/shared/full_page_image_gallery/main/HX_lincoln_21_425x303_FitToBoxSmallDimension_Center.jpg Hampton Inn Manhattan-Times Square North Hotel, NY - Lincoln Center 19 Amenities Hampton Inn Manhattan Times Square North has two COMPLIMENTARY computer kiosks for guests use - located in the lobby. /resources/media/hp/NYCMTHX/en_US/img/shared/full_page_image_gallery/main/HX_center_21_425x303_FitToBoxSmallDimension_Center.jpg Hampton Inn Manhattan-Times Square North Hotel, NY - Computer Kiosks 20 Amenities Hampton Inn Manhattan Times Square North's breakfast room is conveniently located in the hotel lobby, so families and business travelers can quickly dine before heading out on the town. /resources/media/hp/NYCMTHX/en_US/img/shared/full_page_image_gallery/main/HX_breakfastroom01_23_425x303_FitToBoxSmallDimension_Center.jpg Hampton Inn Manhattan-Times Square North Hotel, NY - Breakfast Room 21 Dining Choose from a variety of delicious breakfast items, including freshly made waffles, hearty oatmeal with toppings (offerings vary daily), and enjoy all the juice or coffee you can drink. /resources/media/hp/NYCMTHX/en_US/img/shared/full_page_image_gallery/main/HX_breakfastroom03_24_425x303_FitToBoxSmallDimension_Center.jpg Hampton Inn Manhattan-Times Square North Hotel, NY - Breakfast Room 22 Dining Complimentary On the Run Breakfast Bags™are available from the front desk, Monday–Friday. /resources/media/hp/NYCMTHX/en_US/img/shared/full_page_image_gallery/main/HX_breakfastroom02_25_425x303_FitToBoxSmallDimension_Center.jpg Hampton Inn Manhattan-Times Square North Hotel, NY - Breakfast Room 23 Dining Hampton Inn Manhattan Times Square North offers fresh coffee and tea in the lobby, 24-hours per day. /resources/media/hp/NYCMTHX/en_US/img/shared/full_page_image_gallery/main/HX_coffeebar_23_425x303_FitToBoxSmallDimension_Center.jpg Hampton Inn Manhattan-Times Square North Hotel, NY - Coffe Bar 24 Dining
Skip secondary navigation
At A Glance Hotel Details Maps&Directions Rooms&Suites Plan An Event Special Offers Dining Things To Do
At A Glance
Explore the best that New York City has to offer at Hampton Inn Manhattan-Times Square North
Stay in the heart of Midtown at the Hampton Inn Manhattan-Times Square North hotel, conveniently located on Eighth Avenue at 51st Street. Walk from our contemporary hotel to attractions such as Broadway theaters, Times Square, Central Park, Restaurant Row, Carnegie Hall, Rockefeller Center, museums and shops. The hotel is also convenient to Jacob Javits Convention Center. Take advantage of easy access to all major public transportation, including the Port Authority Bus Terminal, to get around New York City.
Enjoy many modern and complimentary amenities at the Hampton Inn Manhattan-Times Square North hotel. Savor a complimentary hot breakfast. Get to work in the complimentary business center or work out in our complimentary fitness center. Stay connected to your office, friends and family using complimentary internet access. Enjoy these and other thoughtful amenities at this Manhattan hotel.
About The Hotel
Hotel Facts
Modern hotel with many complimentary amenities Best Times Square location, steps from Broadway theaters 300 oversized guest rooms, featuring signature bedding and a 32-inch flat-screen television Full-service Concierge desk
Rooms&Suites Included in Every Stay
Hampton's free hot breakfast Complimentary fitness center Complimentary business center Complimentary internet access
Amenities Share Print
